edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientSupport

Class NSGroupAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientSupport.NSGroupAccess

  • public class NSGroupAccess
extends Object
    GroupAccess provides an interface to the group information in the GNS. The members of a group are stored in a record whose key is the GROUP string.
    Author:
    westy
